snippet: A Portland man has been accused of harassing at least a dozen families of victims of the mass shooting in Aurora, Colo.
lead_paragraph: A Portland man has been accused of harassing at least a dozen families of victims of the mass shooting in Aurora, Colo.

headline.main: Oregon: Man Held in Harassment of Victims’ Kin
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Man Held In Harassment of Victims’ Kin
